articles.title: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Mobile - Ubisoft
articles.description: The official website for Rainbow Six Mobile. An online tactical based 5v5 FPS asymmetrical game. Derived from the world renowned Tom Clancy’s Rainbow Six Siege title. Pre-register today.
articles.content: In this map, youll feel isolated in this deadly outpost set at the border of two countries. Completely surrounded by deserted mountains, this map is composed of old and new buildings and is filled wi… [+131 chars]
